Question
========

Predictive validity indicates the extent to which test scores

Answerlist
----------

* Yield falsifiable predictions.
* Are consistent with a theory.
* Predict scores on a chosen criterion.

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* Deliver falsifiable predictions...: Incorrect
* Be consistent with a theory: Incorrect
* Predict scores on a chosen criterion...: Correct
